QuestData.Title: Crushing the Cores
QuestData.Description: These searing guardians are murderous! We destroy them, and within minutes, they reignite from the ashes.$B$BI think there's a way to destroy them permanently, but we'll need someone who can fight through the front ranks.$B$B$n, kill the searing guardians and take their smoldering cores to the nearby anvils. Smash them on the Twilight Anvils, and destroy them for good!
QuestData.LogDescription: Acquire 8 Smoldering Cores by killing Searing Guardians, then smash them against a Twilight Anvil.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are they dead?$B$BIt seems like nothing we do can cool this inferno...
QuestData.RewardText: Great work!$B$BThere was a time when adventurers would collect these cores in order to craft mediocre fire-resistant equipment. But for now, I'm glad just to destroy these fiends once and for all.
